HOME.TITLE: We Are Ajanta Gold
HOME.DESCRIPTION: Our organization is engaged in handling, trading, and wholesaling a complete range of industrial chemicals. We manufacture and process chemicals using high-quality ingredients and compounds.

ABOUT.TITLE: About Our Creative Process
ABOUT.DESCRIPTION1: Established in 2018, Shree Laxman Chemicals is an ISO-certified company and has achieved a strong position as a manufacturer, exporter, and distributor of industrial chemicals.
ABOUT.DESCRIPTION2: The chemicals we use are of high quality and offer a longer shelf life and reliable usability. We supply less harmful chemical compounds to customers in the chemical industry.

PRODUCTS.TITLE: Our Products
PRODUCTS.DESCRIPTION: The following products are available in various variants, such as scent and size.

PRODUCT.TITLE: AJANTA GOLD BLACK PHENYLE
PRODUCT.DESCRIPTION: Ajanta Gold Black Phenyle kills germs including bacteria, viruses, and fungi. Its powerful formulation disinfects floors and makes them safe.

PRODUCT.TITLE: LAXMI GOLD HYDROCHLORIC (HCL)
PRODUCT.DESCRIPTION: Laxmi Gold Hydrochloric (HCL) disinfectant toilet cleaner kills 99.9% of germs and removes tough yellow stains.

PRODUCT.TITLE: AJANTA GOLD HAND WASH
PRODUCT.DESCRIPTION: Ajanta Gold Hand Wash makes hand washing quicker and more effective while providing 99.9% germ protection.

PRODUCT.TITLE: AJANTA GOLD DISH WASH
PRODUCT.DESCRIPTION: Ajanta Gold Dish Wash is a high-quality product from Shree Laxman Chemicals and is suitable for everyday dishwashing.

PRODUCT.TITLE: AJANTA GOLD NAPHTHALENE BALLS
PRODUCT.DESCRIPTION: Multicolored naphthalene balls are used as insecticides and pest repellents for toilets and wardrobes.

PRODUCT.TITLE: AJANTA GOLD CAMPHOR TABLETS
PRODUCT.DESCRIPTION: Pure camphor tablets used for daily aarti during puja. According to Hindu scriptures, camphor is essential for building a divine connection with deities.

TEAM.TITLE: Meet the Team
TEAM.DESCRIPTION: We have a highly qualified and skilled team.
